Title: Relates to prohibiting illegal drug use and authorizing random drug testing of individuals receiving public assistance
Summary: Relates to prohibiting illegal drug use; authorizes random drug testing of individuals receiving public assistance.
LawCode: Amd ยง132, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to prohibiting illegal drug use and to authorize random drug testing of individuals receiving public assistance
